column4: I got the black bash screen in ubuntu, thats why I'm here. I did my updates and bam my system crashed.
Is there a way to undo updates from the emergency ubuntu bash line?
My ubuntu just crashed because I made a mistake and let it update to a beta version. I was running ubuntu 9.10 but now it is beta 4.
you'll probably need to reinstall if you have upgraded to a version after karmic
